title: Pick your England team to take on New Zealand in the Rugby World Cup 2019 semi-finals
text:
England take on New Zealand in the first semi-final of the Rugby World Cup on Saturday and there are a number of selection dilemmas facing Eddie Jones.

Jack Nowell's return to fitness has given Jones an extra option in the back-three, with the Exeter Chiefs star in exceptional form at full-back before he was injured in the Premiership final. Are England too deep in the tournament for Jones to consider altering his back-three, or is now the right time with Elliot Daly failing to convince under the high ball?

The midfield is also up for debate. Will England revert to the combination of George Ford and Owen Farrell at 10 and 12, despite Henry Slade's key assist for Jonny May's second try against Australia?

England's pack seems to almost pick itself, after outstanding performances from Sam Underhill and Tom Curry, but one area to address is who will partner Maro Itoje in the second row.

Does Jones return to partnering Itoje with his Saracens team-mate George Kruis, or continue with Courtney Lawes after his 15-tackle effort against the Wallabies?

With all these selection issues up for debate, it is over to you to select your starting England XV to take on New Zealand.
description: England take on New Zealand in the first semi-final of the Rugby World Cup on Saturday and there are a number of selection dilemmas facing Eddie Jones.
